scripts.build:dist: dojo build --mode dist --legacy && shx mv output/dist output/dist-legacy && shx cp src/legacy.html output/dist-legacy/index.html
scripts.build:dist:evergreen: dojo build --mode dist && shx mv output/dist output/dist-evergreen && shx cp src/evergreen.html output/dist-evergreen/index.html
scripts.build:dev: dojo build --mode dev --legacy && shx mv output/dev output/dev-legacy && shx cp src/legacy.html output/dev-legacy/index.html
scripts.build:dev:evergreen: dojo build --mode dev && shx mv output/dev output/dev-evergreen && shx cp src/evergreen.html output/dev-evergreen/index.html
